mapper.insert: insert into group_buy_order( team_id, activity_id, source, channel, original_price, deduction_price, pay_price, target_count, complete_count, lock_count, status, create_time, update_time ) values( #{teamId}, #{activityId}, #{source}, #{channel}, #{originalPrice}, #{deductionPrice}, #{payPrice}, #{targetCount}, #{completeCount}, #{lockCount}, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update group_buy_order set lock_count = lock_count + 1, update_time= now() where team_id = #{teamId} and lock_count < target_count
update group_buy_order set lock_count = lock_count - 1, update_time= now() where team_id = #{teamId} and lock_count > 0
mapper.select: select target_count, complete_count, lock_count from group_buy_order where team_id = #{teamId}
